text: Iago is a fictional character in Walt Disney Pictures' 31st animated feature movie Aladdin (1992), the sequels The Return of Jafar (1994), Aladdin and the King of Thieves (1996), and the television series. He is an anthropomorphic red-plumed talking red lory. Iago is one of Aladdin's best friends and Jafar's former henchman. He is voiced by Gilbert Gottfried. Category:Animated characters Category:Fictional birds
title: Iago (Aladdin)
